metadata.title: CVE-2021-25741 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A security issue was discovered in Kubernetes where a user may be able tocreate a container with subpath volume mounts to access files & directoriesoutside of the volume, including on the host filesystem.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
